Text:
lol... Bit of advice... Don't hold your breath waiting on Monday's triumphant return of Michel savage. LOL!  Maybe I will start listening to Coast to Coast AM again, but I do do miss Art Bell.

Savage was like Nemo swimming in a violent sea of PC sharks, it was only a matter of time until he walked.  He is getting sued by everyone and is banned in britain.  he is petrified of saying the wrong thing, no matter what he says.  My guess is he got slapped with a lawsuit that was worse than the others some time days ago, and just said fuck it...

There was a video on "Youtube" for the longest time that someone put together called "Michael savage Say Piss On Islam And Mohamed" It mysteriously disappeared. Hmmmmmmmmmmmmm........ I wonder why? You may have a point honunet, lets see what plays out.
May 4ths is an encore so I will not be posting it. Most of you don't want to hear repeats you have heard rehashed over and over.
